00046   Sass_Queued::Sass_Queued(const string& load_path, const string& abs_path, const char* source)
00047   {
00048     this->load_path = load_path;
00049     this->abs_path = abs_path;
00050     this->source = source;

00053   inline bool sort_importers (const Sass_Importer_Entry& i, const Sass_Importer_Entry& j)
00054   { return sass_importer_get_priority(i) > sass_importer_get_priority(j); }

00056   Context::Context(Context::Data initializers)
00057   : // Output(this),
00058     head_imports(0),
00059     mem(Memory_Manager<AST_Node>()),
00060     c_options               (initializers.c_options()),
00061     c_compiler              (initializers.c_compiler()),
00062     source_c_str            (initializers.source_c_str()),
00063     sources                 (vector<const char*>()),
00064     plugin_paths            (initializers.plugin_paths()),
00065     include_paths           (initializers.include_paths()),
00066     queue                   (vector<Sass_Queued>()),
00067     style_sheets            (map<string, Block*>()),
00068     emitter (this),
00069     c_headers               (vector<Sass_Importer_Entry>()),
00070     c_importers             (vector<Sass_Importer_Entry>()),
00071     c_functions             (vector<Sass_Function_Entry>()),
00072     indent                  (initializers.indent()),
00073     linefeed                (initializers.linefeed()),
00074     input_path              (make_canonical_path(initializers.input_path())),
00075     output_path             (make_canonical_path(initializers.output_path())),
00076     source_comments         (initializers.source_comments()),
00077     output_style            (initializers.output_style()),
00078     source_map_file         (make_canonical_path(initializers.source_map_file())),
00079     source_map_root         (initializers.source_map_root()), // pass-through
00080     source_map_embed        (initializers.source_map_embed()),
00081     source_map_contents     (initializers.source_map_contents()),
00082     omit_source_map_url     (initializers.omit_source_map_url()),
00083     is_indented_syntax_src  (initializers.is_indented_syntax_src()),
00084     names_to_colors         (map<string, Color*>()),
00085     colors_to_names         (map<int, string>()),
00086     precision               (initializers.precision()),
00087     plugins(),
00088     subset_map              (Subset_Map<string, pair<Complex_Selector*, Compound_Selector*> >())
00089   {
00090 
00091     cwd = get_cwd();
00092 
00093     // enforce some safe defaults
00094     // used to create relative file links
00095     if (input_path == "") input_path = "stdin";
00096     if (output_path == "") output_path = "stdout";
00097 
00098     include_paths.push_back(cwd);
00099     collect_include_paths(initializers.include_paths_c_str());
00100     // collect_include_paths(initializers.include_paths_array());
00101     collect_plugin_paths(initializers.plugin_paths_c_str());
00102     // collect_plugin_paths(initializers.plugin_paths_array());
00103 
00104     setup_color_map();
00105 
00106     for (size_t i = 0, S = plugin_paths.size(); i < S; ++i) {
00107       plugins.load_plugins(plugin_paths[i]);
00108     }
00109 
00110     for(auto fn : plugins.get_functions()) {
00111       c_functions.push_back(fn);
00112     }
00113     for(auto fn : plugins.get_headers()) {
00114       c_headers.push_back(fn);
00115     }
00116     for(auto fn : plugins.get_importers()) {
00117       c_importers.push_back(fn);
00118     }
00119 
00120     sort (c_headers.begin(), c_headers.end(), sort_importers);
00121     sort (c_importers.begin(), c_importers.end(), sort_importers);
00122     string entry_point = initializers.entry_point();
00123     if (!entry_point.empty()) {
00124       string result(add_file(entry_point));
00125       if (result.empty()) {
00126         throw "File to read not found or unreadable: " + entry_point;
00127       }
00128     }
00129 
00130     emitter.set_filename(resolve_relative_path(output_path, source_map_file, cwd));
00131 
00132   }

00134   void Context::add_c_function(Sass_Function_Entry function)
00135   {
00136     c_functions.push_back(function);
00137   }
00138   void Context::add_c_header(Sass_Importer_Entry header)
00139   {
00140     c_headers.push_back(header);
00141     // need to sort the array afterwards (no big deal)
00142     sort (c_headers.begin(), c_headers.end(), sort_importers);
00143   }
00144   void Context::add_c_importer(Sass_Importer_Entry importer)
00145   {
00146     c_importers.push_back(importer);
00147     // need to sort the array afterwards (no big deal)
00148     sort (c_importers.begin(), c_importers.end(), sort_importers);
00149   }
00150 
00151   Context::~Context()
00152   {
00153     // everything that gets put into sources will be freed by us
00154     for (size_t n = 0; n < import_stack.size(); ++n) sass_delete_import(import_stack[n]);
00155     // sources are allocated by strdup or malloc (overtaken from C code)
00156     for (size_t i = 0; i < sources.size(); ++i) free((void*)sources[i]);
00157     // clear inner structures (vectors)
00158     sources.clear(); import_stack.clear();
00159   }
00160 
00161   void Context::setup_color_map()
00162   {
00163     size_t i = 0;
00164     while (color_names[i]) {
00165       string name(color_names[i]);
00166       Color* value = new (mem) Color(ParserState("[COLOR TABLE]"),
00167                                      color_values[i*4],
00168                                      color_values[i*4+1],
00169                                      color_values[i*4+2],
00170                                      color_values[i*4+3]);
00171       names_to_colors[name] = value;
00172       // only map fully opaque colors
00173       if (color_values[i*4+3] >= 1) {
00174         int numval = static_cast<int>(color_values[i*4])*0x10000;
00175         numval += static_cast<int>(color_values[i*4+1])*0x100;
00176         numval += static_cast<int>(color_values[i*4+2]);
00177         colors_to_names[numval] = name;
00178       }
00179       ++i;
00180     }
00181   }
00182 
00183   void Context::collect_include_paths(const char* paths_str)
00184   {
00185 
00186     if (paths_str) {
00187       const char* beg = paths_str;
00188       const char* end = Prelexer::find_first<PATH_SEP>(beg);
00189 
00190       while (end) {
00191         string path(beg, end - beg);
00192         if (!path.empty()) {
00193           if (*path.rbegin() != '/') path += '/';
00194           include_paths.push_back(path);
00195         }
00196         beg = end + 1;
00197         end = Prelexer::find_first<PATH_SEP>(beg);
00198       }
00199 
00200       string path(beg);
00201       if (!path.empty()) {
00202         if (*path.rbegin() != '/') path += '/';
00203         include_paths.push_back(path);
00204       }
00205     }
00206   }
00207 
00208   void Context::collect_include_paths(const char** paths_array)
00209   {
00210     if (paths_array) {
00211       for (size_t i = 0; paths_array[i]; i++) {
00212         collect_include_paths(paths_array[i]);
00213       }
00214     }
00215   }

00222       const char* end = Prelexer::find_first<PATH_SEP>(beg);
00223 
00224       while (end) {
00225         string path(beg, end - beg);
00226         if (!path.empty()) {
00227           if (*path.rbegin() != '/') path += '/';
00228           plugin_paths.push_back(path);
00229         }
00230         beg = end + 1;
00231         end = Prelexer::find_first<PATH_SEP>(beg);
00232       }
00233 
00234       string path(beg);
00235       if (!path.empty()) {
00236         if (*path.rbegin() != '/') path += '/';
00237         plugin_paths.push_back(path);
00238       }
00239     }
00240   }

00242   void Context::collect_plugin_paths(const char** paths_array)

00245       for (size_t i = 0; paths_array[i]; i++) {
00246         collect_plugin_paths(paths_array[i]);

00250   void Context::add_source(string load_path, string abs_path, const char* contents)
00251   {
00252     sources.push_back(contents);
00253     included_files.push_back(abs_path);
00254     queue.push_back(Sass_Queued(load_path, abs_path, contents));
00255     emitter.add_source_index(sources.size() - 1);
00256     include_links.push_back(resolve_relative_path(abs_path, source_map_file, cwd));
00257   }

00259   // Add a new import file to the context
00260   string Context::add_file(const string& file)
00261   {
00262     using namespace File;
00263     string path(make_canonical_path(file));
00264     string resolved(find_file(path, include_paths));
00265     if (resolved == "") return resolved;
00266     if (char* contents = read_file(resolved)) {
00267       add_source(path, resolved, contents);
00268       style_sheets[path] = 0;
00269       return path;
00270     }
00271     return string("");
00272   }
00273 
00274   // Add a new import file to the context
00275   // This has some previous directory context
00276   string Context::add_file(const string& base, const string& file)
00277   {
00278     using namespace File;
00279     string path(make_canonical_path(file));
00280     string base_file(join_paths(base, path));
00281     string resolved(resolve_file(base_file));
00282     if (style_sheets.count(base_file)) return base_file;
00283     if (char* contents = read_file(resolved)) {
00284       add_source(base_file, resolved, contents);
00285       style_sheets[base_file] = 0;
00286       return base_file;
00287     }
00288     // now go the regular code path
00289     return add_file(path);
00290   }

00299   char* Context::compile_block(Block* root)
00300   {
00301     if (!root) return 0;
00302     root->perform(&emitter);
00303     emitter.finalize();
00304     OutputBuffer emitted = emitter.get_buffer();
00305     string output = emitted.buffer;
00306     if (source_map_file != "" && !omit_source_map_url) {
00307       output += linefeed + format_source_mapping_url(source_map_file);
00308     }
00309     return sass_strdup(output.c_str());
00310   }
00311 
00312   Block* Context::parse_file()
00313   {
00314     Block* root = 0;
00315     for (size_t i = 0; i < queue.size(); ++i) {
00316       Sass_Import_Entry import = sass_make_import(
00317         queue[i].load_path.c_str(),
00318         queue[i].abs_path.c_str(),
00319         0, 0
00320       );
00321       import_stack.push_back(import);
00322       Parser p(Parser::from_c_str(queue[i].source, *this, ParserState(queue[i].abs_path, queue[i].source, i)));
00323       Block* ast = p.parse();
00324       sass_delete_import(import_stack.back());
00325       import_stack.pop_back();
00326       if (i == 0) root = ast;
00327       style_sheets[queue[i].load_path] = ast;
00328     }
00329     if (root == 0) return 0;
00330     Env tge;
00331     Backtrace backtrace(0, ParserState("", 0), "");
00332     register_built_in_functions(*this, &tge);
00333     for (size_t i = 0, S = c_functions.size(); i < S; ++i) {
00334       register_c_function(*this, &tge, c_functions[i]);
00335     }
00336     Contextualize contextualize(*this, &tge, &backtrace);
00337     Listize listize(*this);
00338     Eval eval(*this, &contextualize, &listize, &tge, &backtrace);
00339     Contextualize_Eval contextualize_eval(*this, &eval, &tge, &backtrace);
00340     Expand expand(*this, &eval, &contextualize_eval, &tge, &backtrace);
00341     Cssize cssize(*this, &tge, &backtrace);
00342     root = root->perform(&expand)->block();
00343     root = root->perform(&cssize)->block();
00344     if (!subset_map.empty()) {
00345       Extend extend(*this, subset_map);
00346       root->perform(&extend);
00347     }
00348 
00349     Remove_Placeholders remove_placeholders(*this);
00350     root->perform(&remove_placeholders);
00351 
00352     return root;
00353   }
00354 
00355   Block* Context::parse_string()
00356   {
00357     if (!source_c_str) return 0;
00358     queue.clear();
00359     if(is_indented_syntax_src) {
00360       char * contents = sass2scss(source_c_str, SASS2SCSS_PRETTIFY_1 | SASS2SCSS_KEEP_COMMENT);
00361       add_source(input_path, input_path, contents);
00362       delete [] source_c_str;
00363       return parse_file();
00364     }
00365     add_source(input_path, input_path, source_c_str);
00366     return parse_file();
00367   }
00368 
00369   char* Context::compile_file()
00370   {
00371     // returns NULL if something fails
00372     return compile_block(parse_file());
00373   }
00374 
00375   char* Context::compile_string()
00376   {
00377     // returns NULL if something fails
00378     return compile_block(parse_string());
00379   }
00380 
00381   string Context::format_source_mapping_url(const string& file)
00382   {
00383     string url = resolve_relative_path(file, output_path, cwd);
00384     if (source_map_embed) {
00385       string map = emitter.generate_source_map(*this);
00386       istringstream is( map );
00387       ostringstream buffer;
00388       base64::encoder E;
00389       E.encode(is, buffer);
00390       url = "data:application/json;base64," + buffer.str();
00391       url.erase(url.size() - 1);
00392     }
00393     return "/*# sourceMappingURL=" + url + " */";
00394   }
00395 
00396   char* Context::generate_source_map()
00397   {
00398     if (source_map_file == "") return 0;
00399     char* result = 0;
00400     string map = emitter.generate_source_map(*this);
00401     result = sass_strdup(map.c_str());
00402     return result;
00403   }

00406   std::vector<std::string> Context::get_included_files(size_t skip)
00407   {
00408       vector<string> includes = included_files;
00409       if (includes.size() == 0) return includes;
00410       std::sort( includes.begin() + skip, includes.end() );
00411       includes.erase( includes.begin(), includes.begin() + skip );
00412       includes.erase( std::unique( includes.begin(), includes.end() ), includes.end() );
00413       // the skip solution seems more robust, as we may have real files named stdin
00414       // includes.erase( std::remove( includes.begin(), includes.end(), "stdin" ), includes.end() );
00415       return includes;
00416   }

00418   string Context::get_cwd()
00419   {
00420     return Sass::File::get_cwd();
00421   }

00423   void register_function(Context& ctx, Signature sig, Native_Function f, Env* env)
00424   {
00425     Definition* def = make_native_function(sig, f, ctx);
00426     def->environment(env);
00427     (*env)[def->name() + "[f]"] = def;
00428   }
00429 
00430   void register_function(Context& ctx, Signature sig, Native_Function f, size_t arity, Env* env)
00431   {
00432     Definition* def = make_native_function(sig, f, ctx);
00433     stringstream ss;
00434     ss << def->name() << "[f]" << arity;
00435     def->environment(env);
00436     (*env)[ss.str()] = def;
00437   }

00439   void register_overload_stub(Context& ctx, string name, Env* env)
00440   {
00441     Definition* stub = new (ctx.mem) Definition(ParserState("[built-in function]"),
00442                                             0,
00443                                             name,
00444                                             0,
00445                                             0,
00446                                             &ctx,
00447                                             true);
00448     (*env)[name + "[f]"] = stub;
00449   }

00453   {
00454     using namespace Functions;

00459     register_function(ctx, rgba_2_sig, rgba_2, 2, env);
00460     register_function(ctx, red_sig, red, env);
00461     register_function(ctx, green_sig, green, env);
00462     register_function(ctx, blue_sig, blue, env);
00463     register_function(ctx, mix_sig, mix, env);

00546   void register_c_functions(Context& ctx, Env* env, Sass_Function_List descrs)
00547   {
00548     while (descrs && *descrs) {
00549       register_c_function(ctx, env, *descrs);
00550       ++descrs;
00551     }
00552   }
00553   void register_c_function(Context& ctx, Env* env, Sass_Function_Entry descr)
00554   {
00555     Definition* def = make_c_function(descr, ctx);
00556     def->environment(env);
00557     (*env)[def->name() + "[f]"] = def;
00558   }
